name: Marc Roth
content: Marc RothSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationMarc Roth (he/his)News: Madhumitha Krishnakumar joined the group as PhD student!About meI am a Lecturer in Theoretical Computer Science at the School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science at Queen Mary University of London. Moreover, I am an Associate Member of the Department of Computer Science at the University of Oxford.Until 2023, I was a Senior Research Associate in Algorithms and Complexity Theory at the Department of Computer Science at the University of Oxford and member of the group of Leslie Ann Goldberg. Before, I was a Junior Research Fellow in Computer Science at Merton College, University of Oxford.I received my PhD in Computer Science at Saarland University and the Cluster of Excellence (MMCI), where I was supervised by Holger Dell.Â My research concerns computational counting problems. In particular, I am interested in the multivariate and exact complexity of counting problems that are infeasible from a classical point of view.Google SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
